headline: BD to Present at Wells Fargo 2025 Healthcare Conference
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that it will present at the Wells Fargo 2025 Healthcare Conference on Wednesday, September 3, 2025 at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time.

headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From BD’s Q2 Earnings Call
summary: BD’s third quarter was marked by a strong positive market reaction, reflecting investor confidence in the company’s margin expansion and execution on commercial initiatives. Management credited the improvement to gains in gross and operating margins, driven by the BD Excellence operating system, and highlighted sequential revenue growth across multiple product lines.
